localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: RecipeCart is a free extension that immediately shows you the recipe in a ready-for-print format. Print, save, or send the recipe to your phone. Under the hood, we use ML to identify exact ingredients + amounts for export to Instacart or Amazon Fresh.
blogPost.body: RecipeCart is a free extension that immediately shows you the recipe in a ready-for-print format. Print, save, or send the recipe to your phone. Under the hood, we use ML to identify exact ingredients + amounts for export to Instacart or Amazon Fresh.
blogPost.title: Recipe Cart Chrome Extension - Instantly see recipe or order ingredients on any recipe site
blogPost.author: Parker

localize.description: RecipeCart是一个免费的扩展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您显示食谱。打印、保存或将食谱发送到您的手机。在幕后，我们使用ML来确定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的确切配料+数量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食谱网站上即时查看食谱或订购食材

localize.description: RecipeCart是一個免費的擴展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您顯示食譜。打印、保存或將食譜發送到您的手機。在幕後，我們使用ML來確定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的確切配料+數量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食譜網站上即時查看食譜或訂購食材

previous.excerpt: Because everyone want to be a part of Clubhouse and there are lot's of scammers everywhere we've decided to organize a Free Invite exchange chain. You get one invite, you share two with others.
previous.title: Clubhouse Invite Bot - Get one invite free, share two with others

localize.description: 因为每个人都想成为Clubhouse的一员，而到处都有很多骗子，所以我们决定组织一个免费的邀请函交换链。你得到一个邀请，你就可以和别人分享两个邀请。
localize.tagline: 免费获得一个邀请，与他人分享两个邀请

localize.description: 因爲每個人都想成爲Clubhouse的一員，而到處都有很多騙子，所以我們決定組織一個免費的邀請函交換鏈。你得到一個邀請，你就可以和別人分享兩個邀請。
localize.tagline: 免費獲得一個邀請，與他人分享兩個邀請
